Title: Scarred by Many Past Frustrations
Writer: Graeme Manson (created by), John Fawcett (created by), Alex Levine, Chris Roberts (executive story editor), Lynn Coady (story editor), Hannah Cheesman (story coordinator), Elize Morgan (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Peter Rowley (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Andrew De Angelis (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Kim Coghill (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Jeff Detsky (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Adam Higgs (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Alex Levine (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Rebecca Sernasie (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident), Bob Mackowycz Jr. (developed with the participation of: Canadian Film Centre story editor resident)
Actors: Tatiana Maslany, Jordan Gavaris, Dylan Bruce, Kevin Hanchard
Plot: Sarah and Helena suffer a strained reunion; the Leda family worries about Sarah's absence.
